headline: Does PG&E’s $73B Grid Upgrade Plan Signal a New Era for Its Stock Value?
summary: If you’ve been watching PG&E’s stock, you probably have one question top of mind right now: is this the right moment to buy, hold, or move on? The stock’s recent climb of 3.5% in just seven days, and a solid 8.8% gain over the past month, is hard to ignore, especially coming off the back of headline-making announcements. PG&E has just committed to an ambitious $73B plan to upgrade its transmission network by 2030, targeting skyrocketing electricity demand from the data center boom. At the...
